name: Cannon Fotter
description:
(Please note that we are a two person indie team and this is a short (2-3.5 hour) game. With that out of the way...)



Gameplay


  • Shoot yourself out of cannons, and destroy stuff in VR! Take down structures in creative and explosive ways.

  • Over 50 levels, and secret areas, present new challenges and puzzles, allowing you to strategize and plan your destructive path.

  • Splinter wood, and shatter rock... or whatever gets in your way! Create magnificent chaos by experimenting with different angles, velocities, and explosives to obliterate everything in your way!

  • Perfect your skills and earn the high score by using the fewest shots possible to cause the most destruction!

Story


You're one of a few surviving woodland Otters, fighting to take back your home from an invading army of adorable but absolutely evil Beavers. It's time for revenge!

Get ready to embark on an adrenaline-pumping, physics shaking adventure like no other with Cannon Fotter, the ultimate VR tower destruction game! Made by a two person team, Cannon Fotter makes you the master of demolition, armed with nothing but your courage, a powerful cannon, and your body.
